elements: Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He would like you to provide him with any information you can assemble on the secret histories of the world. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He's looking for a substantial treatise on the secret histories of the world. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He's looking for particularly obscure information on the secret histories of the world. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He would like you to provide him with any information you can assemble on the severe mysteries of the Lantern. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He would like you to provide him with a substantial discussion of the severe mysteries of the Lantern. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Dr Ibn al-Adim, called the Aleppine, has offered you a commission. He would like you to provide him with an extensive investigation of the severe mysteries of the Lantern. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She'd like something inspired by the principle of the Forge. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]
Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She'd like something more substantial on the Forge. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She'd like something extensive, or indeed intense, on the change and the suffering the Forge brings. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She would like something titillating about the Red Grail. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She's interested in a more substantial response to the Red Grail and its allure. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She wants something extensive and 'unflinching' on the Red Grail. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. In particular, she wants something suitably intriguing about the principle called Moth. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]
Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She wants a substantially enigmatic piece on Moth. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]

Mme Olympe Bechet is seeking suitable articles for the 'Kerisham Review'. She'd like an extensive elaboration of Moth and its enigmas. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]
The Count will pay for information of interest. This time, he'd like some notes on the corporal mysteries of the Heart. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]
The Count will pay for information of interest. This time, he'd like substantial research on the corporal mysteries of the Heart. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]
The Count will pay for information of interest. This time, he'd like extensive research on the corporal mysteries of the Heart.[ Use Talk to complete this commission.]
The Count will pay for information of interest. This time, he'd like whatever you can assemble on the practices of the Edge. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]
The Count will pay for information of interest. This time, he'd like substantial notes on the practices of the Edge. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]
The Count will pay for information of interest. This time, he'd like an extensive work on the practices of the Edge. [use Work to complete this commission, and Talk to get paid for it.]
